location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 415 from John Pollard Willoughby, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the alleged abduction of girls from the coast of Burburra [Berbera] by the Joasmees [Āl Qāsimī]; the Resident is urged to induce the Imam of Muscat, Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd; and 'the Arab Chief' to prohibit the slave trade.
